thread.section_title: Paypal Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paypal | www.paypal.com
thread.title: steve

author: steve
title: steve
text:
Just recently purchased an item on eBay via buy it now . two days later i am sent a email from eBay to say the listing had been removed it was posted on a sellers hacked account and because it was fraudulent the eBay money back guarantee did not apply !
Great thank you eBay
Luckily for me i had paid using pay-pal , i contacted them via phone they opened a case for me and within 5 days the payment was returned to my account.
Brilliant
Have had a pay-pal account for years now, have only had this and one other issue and pay-pal came up trumps both times with minimal fuss.
always polite always helpful. personally i would recommend to anyone
